root.TITLE: SHEARSON LEHMAN NAMES NEW MANAGING DIRECTOR
root.BODY: Shearson Lehman Brothers, a unit of American Express Co <AXP>, said Robert Stearns has joined the company as managing director of its merger and acquisition department. Shearson said Stearns formerly was part of Merrill Lynch Pierce, Fenner and Smith Inc's <MER> merger and acquisitions department.
